description:
Partnership for Revitalization of Rural Areas
The purpose of this project is to share the experience of new EU member states with Serbian municipalities regarding preparations for development and implementation of rural development policies.

subproject.description: Through a combination of different capacity development methods, such as trainings and pilot projects, this project will help prepare Serbia for implementation of upcoming programmes such as the EU's Instrument for Pre-Assistance for Rural Development (IPARD). Project activities will target the municipalities of Alibunar (including Seleus), Vrsac (including Markovac), Cuprija (including Isakovo) and Bor (including Slatina).
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Partnership for Revitalization

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities

title: Partnership for Revitalization of Rural Areas
